content: length hood row 1 working into foundation chain join with double_crochet into first chain double_crochet in next 4 chs double_crochet twice in next chain double_crochet in next 5 chs 2 times v-st in next chain double_crochet in next 5 chs double_crochet twice in next chain 2 times double_crochet in last 5 chs row 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet v-st in chsp in back repeat row 2 until hood reaches desired depth head depth plus a few inches then last increase row double_crochet in each double_crochet double_crochet twice in chsp continue to double_crochet in each double_crochet until hood reaches desired height head height plus a few inches join the top hem of the hood using scs note using scs to join will result in a ridge this can be worn on the outside as a decorative feature or on the inside you could alternatively use a different join if you prefer i like the scs because they are very sturdy border rsc evenly all the way around bottom and front hems including front hem of hood weave in ends and pat yourself on the back for a job well done
